body: I can't read kanji either, but it looks to me like people here are misunderstanding the 'plot'. The MC likes the black haired chick, yes, but Blackie actually likes the other guy and she was jealous of the other girl(Blondie) for screwing him. She didn't let the MC fuck her and instead jumped on the other guy. I don't know the relationship between the other guy and Blondie, but it doesn't seem like there's anything special between the two. Rather than the usual wimp type of dude you see usually in NTR, this one is just not lucky with his crush.
Meh, it's the usual Freedom Prophet non-effort.

hmm why this prophet guy MCS are always cowards  that even if the girl wants to fuck the guy is a cowards then the MCs girl or love interest fuck with the friend and then turns into a slut? well i don't think ill follow any more of his art , theyre trully generic and repetitive even if his ART its good.

No entendí bien al MC le gustaba la rubia o la pelinegra y la pelinegra se metió con el amigo de MC porque estaba celosa de la rubia y le gustaba realmente el amigo de MC? Y la rubia no le gustaba nadie realmente solo le gustaba divertirse.

Pues no entendí solo que se jodió la amistad solo eso.
lol got fucked for being a fucking coward
the art is so good but the story is so fucked up. Just why...

Ah fuck, that had me confused on who was who, I retract what I said earlier. But, to me, it felt like the dark-haired girl was sorta pissed at loser having no courage and fucks the cuck out of spite and blonde was just into the fun but surprised those two went rough with a few rounds while loser was sobbing. @below: yea, that's probably what FP is good at stories about wishy-washy betas that either let chances slip, weak-willed, or just plain dumbasses; in which, it might not be a bad thing: so to tell us, the readers, don't be betas or be a loser for real lol
This is a legit rip off of 253611 lmao
Yeah, freedom prophet seems to focus on a lot of weak willed, indecisive losers when it comes to who is getting cheated on.

Anyway you look at it he’s a little bitch who can’t decide which girl he likes..lol It wasn’t swinging none of them were dating just classmates. The dark haired girl liked the loser but the loser liked the blonde more than he liked the dark haired girl.
Well, that's what happens when they swing and swap. It's a no-brainer thing.
I can't read kanji, but I'll bet 50 bucks the black haired girl liked the cuck and he was too chicken to fuck her.
